channel.title: My ints for my gates need help

item.title: My ints for my gates need help
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

im using repagescape what did “the reaper” use his base off of?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2009, 03:32:10 am[/size][hr]where do i add this?
keeps giving me an error pointing after tge 2 )) at ycordshere like
If ((absX == xcordshere) && (absY == ycordshere)) {
teleportToX = xteledtohere;
teleportToY = yteledtohere;
sendMessage(“optionalmessagehere”);
}

If ((absX == xcordshere) && (absY == ycordshere)) {
^

Read full topic
item.source: My ints for my gates need help

item.title: My ints for my gates need help
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

mironic:

how would i make it so when us tand on the spot you get teled then though lol

Hmm, if you have a 317 this should work. Well, unless you are using a delta base, i only know the message and teleport methods for delta, i dont know is the absX and absY are diferent.

If ((absX == xcordshere) && (absY == ycordshere)) {
teleportToX = xteledtohere;
teleportToY = yteledtohere;
sendMessage("optionalmessagehere");
}

Read full topic

item.title: My ints for my gates need help
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Kuchiki, post:5, topic:292995”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=387147.msg2900729#msg2900729 date=1249496531]

its not a door… its a warp gate[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2009, 12:58:35 am[/size][hr]and how would i add that in?

Hmm, instead of “enter” just code it server sided to where you stand on a marked spot, you get teleported.
[/quote]

That sounds better. Could add a little gfx too, lol.[/quote]
Yea, that woudnt be bad. I will look forward to seeing an in-game small vid of em working and such.

Read full topic

item.title: My ints for my gates need help
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

Silent Cjs Ints in his tutorial are not exactly correct i need help with these 3 ints

[code] if(i == 42)// Desired Object id
{
class46.aString739 = “Moon Gate (open)”; //object name
class46.aByteArray777 = “this will teleport me to the sungate.”.getBytes(); //examine
class46.anInt744 = 1;
class46.anInt761 = 1;
class46.anIntArray773 = new int[1];
class46.anIntArray773[0] = 8560; // Model id
class46.aBoolean778 = true;
class46.aBoolean767 = false;
class46.aBoolean762 = false;
class46.aBoolean769 = false;
}

    if(i == 44)// Desired Object id
    {
        class46.aString739 = "Moon Gate (Closed)"; //object name
        class46.aByteArray777 = "this will not do anything... maybe i could power it up some how?".getBytes(); //examine
        class46.anInt744 = 1;
        class46.anInt761 = 1;
        class46.anIntArray773 = new int[1];
        class46.anIntArray773[0] = 8561; // Model id
        class46.aBoolean778 = true;
        class46.aBoolean767 = false;
        class46.aBoolean762 = false;
        class46.aBoolean769 = false;
    }
    if(i == 83)// Desired Object id
    {
        class46.aString739 = "Sungate"; //object name
        class46.aByteArray777 = "this will teleport me back to the moon gate.".getBytes(); //examine
        class46.anInt744 = 1;
        class46.anInt761 = 1;
        class46.anIntArray773 = new int[1];
        class46.anIntArray773[0] = 8562; // Model id
        class46.aBoolean778 = true;
        class46.aBoolean767 = false;
        class46.aBoolean762 = false;
        class46.aBoolean769 = false;
    }[/code]

heres the problems

1: you can walk through them ( how do i make them none walk throughable )
2: there is no option on them saying enter ( how would i put that )

Read full topic
